entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of flurries near noon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 late in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 13 March 2023
